Workflow is simple as 6

Costs and deadlines estimation

  • After I get a figma layout and technical specification it takes me about 2 days to look through the task and estimate costs and deadlines. Usually the discrepancy is no more than 5%.

01

Systematic progress report

  • - I will notify you about every finished part. This approach will allow you to be aware of the progress and control your project on any stage.

02

NO prepayment at the start

  • - I start work immediately as we reach an agreement on the project.
  • - With another option, we divide payments into specific parts of the project.

03

Payment in parts

  • - You will pay only for the work done.
  • Simple example:
  • - Header is done, you've seen it and fully satisfied. You pay for this part only after that.

04

Payment methods

  • Now available:
  • PayPal
  • Crypto (Monero - will give you 10% discout)
  • ... more to come

05

100% warranty

  • - I give warranty on any work that I do.
  • - I guarantee that you will be satisfied with the result of my work. BUT I am responsible for my and only my work, so if someone else messes up the project, I can no longer guarantee a quality result and will reject any claims.
  • - I give 30-days of post-development support after the project is handed over to the customer. But if you still have issues after that period, do not hesitate to contact me, and I will help you to solve your problem.
  • - If you want me to fix other people's mistakes - it will cost you some money.

06

Current location

Israel

Nahariya

Gericht Restaurant

  • - 20 days from order placement till completion.
  • - Layout was provided by a designer.

  • - Payment stages:

    • -- 50% after first page was made and approved.
    • -- 50% after hole project was sent to a customer.
    • - Type of the project - multi-page website.

SUV for every occasion

  • - Development time - 11 days.
  • - Layout was provided by a customer.
  • - Full payment after project received by the customer.
  • - Type of the project - one-page website.

Furniture

  • - 17 days from order placement till completion.
  • - Layout was provided by a designer.

  • - Payment stages:

    • -- 50% after first page was made and approved.
    • -- 50% after hole project was sent to a customer.
    • - Type of the project - multi-page website.
